response.overview: The true story of how businessman Oskar Schindler saved over a thousand Jewish lives from the Nazis while they worked as slaves in his factory during World War II.
response.tagline: Whoever saves one life, saves the world entire.
response.title: Schindler's List

titles.title: Schindler's List - La lista di Schindler
